name: Callout
description: Highlighted note, tip, warning, or info box
guidelines: Choose the appropriate type for the message
Place near relevant content, not randomly
Use for important information that deserves emphasis

examples.title: Performance Optimization
examples.content: Enable sampling in production environments to reduce overhead while maintaining visibility. Start with 10% sampling and adjust based on your needs.
Never log sensitive information like passwords, API keys, or personal data in production logs. Use structured logging with field redaction instead.
